sentences.en: Malaria is endemic in many hot countries.
sentences.cn: 疟疾是许多气候炎热国家的流行病。

sentences.en: At present, no widely approved vaccine exists for malaria.
sentences.cn: 目前没有被广泛认可的疟疾疫苗。

sentences.en: They are already battling to eradicate illnesses such as malaria and tetanus.
sentences.cn: 他们已经在为根除疟疾、破伤风等疾病而斗争。
